Grade Description: Excellent time management skills. The candidate demonstrates strong prioritization, planning, and proactive behaviors.
Good time management skills. The candidate shows good awareness of time management principles and mostly makes productive choices.
Moderate time management skills. The candidate shows basic understanding but may struggle with prioritization or proactivity.
Below average time management skills. The candidate demonstrates some awareness but often makes ineffective choices.
Poor time management skills. The candidate lacks basic time management skills and consistently makes poor choices.
Excellent change management skills. The candidate demonstrates adaptability, resilience, and a proactive approach to managing change.
Good change management skills. The candidate shows a willingness to adapt and support change initiatives with some positive actions.
Moderate change management skills. The candidate accepts change but may struggle with motivation or proactive involvement.
Below average change management skills. The candidate shows resistance to change and lacks engagement with adapting to new situations.
Poor change management skills. The candidate demonstrates strong resistance to change, with a rigid approach and lack of flexibility.
Excellent communication skills. The candidate shows clarity, empathy, adaptability, and an understanding of audience needs.
Good communication skills. The candidate communicates effectively in most scenarios, with room for minor improvements.
Moderate communication skills. The candidate shows basic communication skills but may struggle with clarity or empathy in some situations.
Below average communication skills. The candidate demonstrates gaps in active listening, clarity, and adapting to the audience.
Poor communication skills. The candidate shows little awareness of effective communication practices and lacks adaptability and clarity.
High emotional intelligence. The candidate shows strong self-awareness, empathy, and adaptability, effectively managing emotions and relationships.
Good emotional intelligence. The candidate demonstrates solid emotional management skills and empathy, though there may be minor areas for improvement.
Moderate emotional intelligence. The candidate has some EI skills but may struggle with self-regulation, empathy, or relationship management in challenging situations.
Low emotional intelligence. The candidate shows limited awareness of emotional impact and struggles with managing emotions and interpersonal interactions.
Poor emotional intelligence. The candidate lacks self-awareness and struggles with empathy and emotional regulation, affecting their ability to interact effectively with others.
Excellent delegation skills. The candidate demonstrates trust, clear communication, accountability, and the ability to empower team members effectively.
Good delegation skills. The candidate generally delegates well but may occasionally struggle with trust or follow-up.
Moderate delegation skills. The candidate shows some understanding of delegation but may lack consistency in empowerment, feedback, or workload management.
Below average delegation skills. The candidate has difficulty delegating effectively and may lack trust or clarity in assigning tasks.
Poor delegation skills. The candidate demonstrates a reluctance to delegate and struggles with empowerment and accountability.
Excellent stress management skills. The candidate demonstrates resilience, adaptability, and the ability to maintain focus and calmness under pressure.
Good stress management skills. The candidate generally manages stress well but may benefit from fine-tuning their approach in high-stakes situations.
Moderate stress management skills. The candidate can handle stress to some extent but may struggle to adapt quickly in intense situations.
Low stress management skills. The candidate may find it difficult to manage stress effectively, which could impact performance and interactions.
Poor stress management skills. The candidate demonstrates a limited ability to handle stress and may face challenges in high-pressure environments.

Excellent Leadership Potential - The candidate shows a balanced, empathetic, and effective approach to leadership, demonstrating strong skills in team motivation, conflict resolution, accountability, and decision-making.
Good Leadership Potential - The candidate is generally strong in leadership but could enhance consistency in team communication, adaptability, or empowerment.
Moderate Leadership Potential - The candidate has some leadership traits but may need more development in decision-making, accountability, or team collaboration.
Low Leadership Potential - The candidate shows limited leadership skills, particularly in areas such as adaptability, empowerment, and conflict resolution.
Very Limited Leadership Potential - The candidate has significant challenges in demonstrating effective leadership, with a need for improvement in multiple key areas.
Excellent Team-Building Skills - The candidate shows strong team-building abilities, fostering collaboration, trust, and inclusiveness. They consistently work to improve team morale and cohesiveness.
Good Team-Building Skills - The candidate demonstrates effective team-building traits, though they may benefit from additional emphasis on inclusiveness or trust-building.
Moderate Team-Building Skills - The candidate shows some team-building ability but may need further development in collaboration, trust, and engagement.
Low Team-Building Skills - The candidate has limited team-building skills and may struggle with fostering collaboration and inclusiveness.
Very Limited Team-Building Skills - The candidate demonstrates minimal ability to build a cohesive, collaborative team environment.
Excellent Conflict Management Skills - The candidate shows high emotional intelligence, fosters constructive conflict resolution, and demonstrates empathy and proactivity in handling disputes.
Good Conflict Management Skills - The candidate manages conflicts effectively and maintains positive team dynamics, though they may benefit from additional focus on proactive resolution.
Moderate Conflict Management Skills - The candidate shows some conflict management skills but may need further development in mediation, proactive engagement, or empathy.
Low Conflict Management Skills - The candidate has limited conflict management abilities and may struggle with addressing issues constructively or collaboratively.
Very Limited Conflict Management Skills - The candidate demonstrates minimal conflict resolution skills, showing little inclination to address or resolve team disputes.

Excellent Negotiation Skills - The candidate demonstrates strong negotiation abilities, seeking mutually beneficial solutions, balancing assertiveness with flexibility, and maintaining positive relationships.
Good Negotiation Skills - The candidate shows effective negotiation skills and a focus on balanced outcomes, though they may benefit from increased adaptability or sensitivity to others’ needs.
Moderate Negotiation Skills - The candidate has basic negotiation skills but may require development in empathy, flexibility, or creating win-win scenarios.
Low Negotiation Skills - The candidate shows limited negotiation abilities and may struggle to achieve positive outcomes that satisfy all parties involved.
Very Limited Negotiation Skills - The candidate lacks basic negotiation skills, potentially leading to strained relationships and suboptimal outcomes.
Excellent Coaching & Mentorship Skills - The candidate demonstrates a strong commitment to coaching and mentoring, fostering growth, and supporting others effectively.
Good Coaching & Mentorship Skills - The candidate shows effective coaching and mentorship abilities but may benefit from deeper engagement or tailored approaches.
Moderate Coaching & Mentorship Skills - The candidate has basic coaching skills but may require further development in facilitating growth and providing feedback.
Low Coaching & Mentorship Skills - The candidate shows limited coaching and mentorship abilities, potentially struggling to support others effectively.
Very Limited Coaching & Mentorship Skills - The candidate demonstrates minimal understanding of coaching and mentorship, lacking the necessary skills to develop and guide others.
Excellent Innovation & Creativity Skills - The candidate demonstrates strong innovation and creativity, effectively fostering an environment that encourages new ideas and approaches.
Good Innovation & Creativity Skills - The candidate shows solid creativity and innovation abilities but may need to enhance their approach to encouraging others.
Moderate Innovation & Creativity Skills - The candidate has basic skills in innovation and creativity but may require further development to think outside the box.
Low Innovation & Creativity Skills - The candidate shows limited innovative thinking and may struggle to generate or support new ideas.
Very Limited Innovation & Creativity Skills - The candidate lacks fundamental innovation and creativity skills, potentially hindering their ability to contribute to growth and improvement.

Excellent Client Relationship Management Skills - The candidate demonstrates a strong ability to build and maintain positive client relationships, effectively addressing concerns and anticipating needs.
Good Client Relationship Management Skills - The candidate shows solid client management abilities but may need to enhance their engagement and proactive approach.
Moderate Client Relationship Management Skills - The candidate has basic skills in managing client relationships but may require further development in communication and problem-solving.
Low Client Relationship Management Skills - The candidate shows limited ability to manage client relationships, potentially struggling to address concerns and build rapport.
Very Limited Client Relationship Management Skills - The candidate lacks fundamental client management skills, which may hinder their effectiveness in client-facing roles.
Excellent Networking Skills - The candidate demonstrates a proactive and effective approach to networking, actively building and maintaining valuable relationships.
Good Networking Skills - The candidate shows solid networking abilities but may need to enhance their engagement and follow-up strategies.
Moderate Networking Skills - The candidate has basic skills in networking but may require further development in communication and relationship-building.
Low Networking Skills - The candidate shows limited ability to network, potentially struggling to establish or maintain professional relationships.
Very Limited Networking Skills - The candidate lacks fundamental networking skills, which may hinder their effectiveness in professional environments.
Excellent Decision-Making & Problem-Solving Skills - The candidate demonstrates strong analytical abilities, effective problem-solving, and sound decision-making processes.
Good Decision-Making & Problem-Solving Skills - The candidate shows solid skills in these areas but may need to enhance their engagement and proactive approaches.
Moderate Decision-Making & Problem-Solving Skills - The candidate has basic skills in decision-making and problem-solving but may require further development and guidance.
Low Decision-Making & Problem-Solving Skills - The candidate shows limited ability to effectively make decisions and solve problems, indicating a need for significant improvement.
Very Limited Decision-Making & Problem-Solving Skills - The candidate lacks fundamental decision-making and problem-solving skills, which may hinder their effectiveness in professional settings.
